name: Companies included in the survey that were not in the original sampling frame: 2008–15
description: Companies included in the survey that were not in the original sampling frame: 2008–15

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: This table shows the counts of companies that were found during the update procedures, were added to each year's sample, and mailed a form. These company counts are not in table A-2.
sources: National Science Foundation, National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, and U.S. Census Bureau, Business R&D and Innovation Survey.
